Each_item.News_content: BP PLC announces a strategic shift towards renewable energy investments, reducing its focus on oil exploration. This move aligns with global trends toward sustainability and is expected to reshape the company's portfolio over the next decade.
Analysts at Morgan Stanley downgrade BP PLC stock citing concerns about declining profitability in traditional fossil fuel operations amid increasing regulatory pressures.
A minor fire at one of BP's offshore drilling platforms has been contained with no injuries reported. Operations are expected to resume within days.
